Package com.intellij.openapi

Class MnemonicHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.ComponentTreeWatcher
      • com.intellij.openapi.MnemonicHelper

  • public final class MnemonicHelper
extends ComponentTreeWatcher
    Automatically locates & characters in texts of buttons and labels on a component or dialog, registers the mnemonics for those characters and removes them from the control text.
